atlantisom 0.1
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • AtlantisOMtoSSVignette

Reference

Load

Functions that read in output from Atlantis.

load_bioind()

Load Atlantis [...]BiomIndx.txt file

load_agebioind()

Load Atlantis [...]AgeBiomIndx.txt file

load_biolprm()

Load Atlantis _Biol.prm file

load_box()

Load the box specification file for an Atlantis scenario

load_boxarea()

Extract the box area from the bgm-file

load_bps()

Extracts the names of the epibenthic biomasspools from the initial conditions file.

load_catch()

Load Atlantis [...]catch.txt file

load_detailed_diet_comp()

Load Atlantis diet composition by box and layer from DetaileDietCheck.txt

load_diet_comp()

Load Atlantis diet composition data from diet_check.txt

load_fgs()

Load the functional group file

load_fisheries()

Load the fisheries group file

load_meta()

Open the necessary files to document the atlantis model used for generating data from the scenario

load_nc()

Load Atlantis outputfiles (netcdf)

load_nc_annage()

Load Atlantis annual age outputfiles (netcdf)

load_nc_physics()

Load Atlantis outputfiles (netcdf)

load_runprm()

Load Atlantis _run.prm file

load_yoy()

Load Atlantis [...]YOY.txt file

Create

Functions that conduct run multiple sample functions to create either fishery-independent or fishery-dependent data.

SS_write_EWAA()

Function to write an empirical weight at age SS file (wt_at_age.ss) from Atlantis output

SS_write_biol()

Writes life history parameters

SS_write_comps()

Function to write age and length composition data from atlantisom to Stock Synthesis 3.30. Note: every time this function is called, it overwrites the age and length composition data currently in the ss_data_list object.

SS_write_ts()

Function to write the CPUE from an atlantis OM into a Stock Synthesis 3.3 estimation model

aggregateData()

Aggregate and select data from Atlantis output

aggregateDensityData()

Aggregate and select density data from Atlantis output

aggregate_comps()

Function to aggregate compositions into a shorter range of bins based on data availability in each bin

calc_Z()

Calculate total mortality for age structured groups

calc_age2length()

Calculate length from ages

calc_avgwtstage2age()

Approximating the average weight at true age from stage-specific average weight.

calc_biomass_age()

Calculate biomass in t per age-structured-groups per polygon, time and ageclass.

calc_pred_diet()

Calculate eaten biomass in tonnes for each functional group.

calc_stage2age()

Approximating the true numbers at age within each box, functional group and time step.

calc_timestep2time()

Converts timestep from Atlantis output to real time

create_fishery_subset()

Create fishery subset from Atlantis output

create_survey()

Create survey observations from Atlantis output

create_survey_diet()

Create survey diet observations from Atlantis output

create_survey_env()

Create environmental survey data subset from Atlantis output

get_boundary()

Get boundary boxes from Atlantis box information.

load_agebioind()

Load Atlantis [...]AgeBiomIndx.txt file

load_bioind()

Load Atlantis [...]BiomIndx.txt file

load_biolprm()

Load Atlantis _Biol.prm file

load_box()

Load the box specification file for an Atlantis scenario

load_boxarea()

Extract the box area from the bgm-file

load_bps()

Extracts the names of the epibenthic biomasspools from the initial conditions file.

load_catch()

Load Atlantis [...]catch.txt file

load_detailed_diet_comp()

Load Atlantis diet composition by box and layer from DetaileDietCheck.txt

load_diet_comp()

Load Atlantis diet composition data from diet_check.txt

load_fgs()

Load the functional group file

load_fisheries()

Load the fisheries group file

load_meta()

Open the necessary files to document the atlantis model used for generating data from the scenario

load_nc()

Load Atlantis outputfiles (netcdf)

load_nc_annage()

Load Atlantis annual age outputfiles (netcdf)

load_nc_physics()

Load Atlantis outputfiles (netcdf)

load_runprm()

Load Atlantis _run.prm file

load_yoy()

Load Atlantis [...]YOY.txt file

om_comps()

Generate composition data from atlantisom

om_diet()

Generate diet composition data from atlantisom

om_index()

Generate index data from atlantisom

om_init()

Initializes atlantisom

om_species()

Species-specific atlantisom outputs

read_savedfisheries()

Read saved fishery outputs into R object

read_savedsurvs()

Read saved survey outputs into R object

reformat_compositions()

Reformat compositional data for input in to Stock Synthesis

run_stocksynthesis()

Function to execute an SS run

run_truth()

Load Atlantis scenario output

sample_ages()

Add observation error to numbers-at-age data

sample_diet()

Sample total consumption to create diet composition data

sample_fish()

Sample numbers-at-age to create composition data

sample_fishery_totcatch()

Sample a fishery catch index from an atlantis scenario

sample_survey_biomass()

Sample a biomass index of abundance from an atlantis scenario

sample_survey_numbers()

Sample a numbers index of abundance from an atlantis scenario

write_SS_ctl()

write SS control

write_SS_dat()

Read SS dat

write_meta()

Write metadata to the disk.

Sample

Functions for manipulate Atlantis data which signifies the truth. These manipulations generate sampled data for use in various estimation models.

sample_ages()

Add observation error to numbers-at-age data

sample_diet()

Sample total consumption to create diet composition data

sample_fish()

Sample numbers-at-age to create composition data

sample_fishery_totcatch()

Sample a fishery catch index from an atlantis scenario

sample_survey_biomass()

Sample a biomass index of abundance from an atlantis scenario

sample_survey_numbers()

Sample a numbers index of abundance from an atlantis scenario

Write

Functions for writing output the disk.

write_meta()

Write metadata to the disk.

Other

Need to categorize

aggregate_comps()

Aggregate and select data from Atlantis output

Calculate eaten biomass in tonnes for each functional group.

Load Atlantis scenario output

Writes life history parameters

SS_write_comps()
